OrgName: Warner Bros. Advanced Digital Services, a division of Warner Bros. Technical Operations Inc.
activities: Warner Bros. Advanced Digital Services collects personally identifiable information directly from visitors to various Warner Bros. or third party websites via online and mobile devices, for such purposes as to enable registration and support; alert consumers to new products, enhancements, upgrade opportunities; for participation in contests, sweepstakes, and promotions; to provide products and services, as well as to personalize those products and services; to engage in commercial transactions (e.g. billing, account and payment processing); for direct marketing to consumers; to analyze data to improve products and services;; to detect and prevent fraud; and as required or permitted by law.
contacttitle1: Senior Vice President and Chief Privacy Officer, Corporate Legal
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President and General Counsel, Warner Bros. Technical Operations
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
